name: GodisLove
0:
”Alexa, open god is love”
”Alexa, start god is love”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: god is love
des: Start your day with an inspirational scriptures from the Bible reminding you that God is Love and he loves you. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
